alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Northern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 26 at 2:00AM MST until December 26 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM MST THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Lea and Central Lea Counties. * WHEN...This morning through early this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust could temporarily reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Northern Lea County
